channel.title: Comments on: User Experience Of The Future
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Hehe... good one. Still, I would like the desktop to be better. And since you asked, I expect it to be able to enter the query you just presented and get the results :)
item.content:encoded: Hehe… good one. Still, I would like the desktop to be better. And since you asked, I expect it to be able to enter the query you just presented and get the results :)

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: I have a question: how do you find all the documents which are in certain directory, were updated no earlier than one month ago and have 'a' in their name? 'find' looks like easiest answer still, no matter how 3D the desktop is. ;)
item.content:encoded: I have a question: how do you find all the documents which are in certain directory, were updated no earlier than one month ago and have ‘a’ in their name? ‘find’ looks like easiest answer still, no matter how 3D the desktop is. ;)
